title: AI/ Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Join a new and growing team at Eastgate Software focused on developing machine learning applications to transform Healthcare and Intelligent Transportation Systems. The team is solving Computer Vision problems, design and optimize, and inventing Machine Learning inspired techniques that will change the way of life for our future. See your work impact millions of people around the world. Ongoing investigations in our team revolve around:
•	Deep Learning (with focus on computer vision problems: Object Detection, Object Segmentation, OCR)
•	Reinforcement Learning
•	Bayesian Optimization, Gaussian Processes
•	Unsupervised Learning in the context of various SoC big data/optimization problems (e.g., minimize chip power, area).
•	Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes
•	Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy
requirements:
-	Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent
-	Strong passion for big data and data science
-	At least 1-year experience with the following areas: Python, TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Machine Learning Fundamentals
-	Experience with implementing machine learning & analytics algorithms in classification.
-	An amazing team player most important!
-	Strong analytical and communication skills
